name: 8h0st Goth City
description:
You're a ghost, armed with a guitar and an ambition to rule the airwaves with your own brand of goth rock.

How to play: 

Controls: WASD for movement, SPACE to fire, SPACE/ESC to navigate menus

- Grow your fame by playing venues from the Pub to the Concert Hall, then put your song on wax at the Studio and finally, take your music to the Radio

- Avoid Rabid Fans who will try to slow you down, the Ghost Police who are out to exorcise you, and the Critics who will write anything to knock you down from the Hall Of Fame

- Stun your foes by firing off loud riffs from your ghostly guitar

Made for PIGSquad's Music first jam 2020 by
- Code & music by Petri @balticzmonster
- Visuals by Guilherme
